text: Yaĥlifūna Billāhi Mā Qālū Wa Laqad Qālū Kalimata Al-Kufri Wa Kafarū Ba`da 'Islāmihim Wa Hammū Bimā Lam Yanālū Wa Mā Naqamū 'Illā 'An 'Aghnāhumu Allāhu Wa Rasūluhu Min Fađlihi Fa'in Yatūbū Yaku Khayrāan Lahum Wa 'In Yatawallaw Yu`adhibhumu Allāhu `Adhābāan 'Alīmāan Fī Ad-Dunyā Wa Al-'Ākhirati Wa Mā Lahum Fī Al-'Arđi Min Wa Līyin Wa Lā Naşīrin
